title: Jaylen Brown scores 41, Sam Hauser hits 10 threes in Celtics win over Hawks
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Boston Celtics Hauser became the first player in NBA history to attempt 20 or more threes without taking a shot inside the arc.
Jaylen Brown dropped 41 in his hometown Saturday.
(AP Photo/Mike Stewart) It’s not every night that a player becomes the first person in NBA history to achieve a certain feat.

title: 18 stats to know for Sunday’s Texans-Patriots divisional round matchup
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots' offense against the Texans' defense will be a real strength against strength battle.
Drake Maye will have to beat a Texans defense that's arguably the league's best to help the Patriots reach the AFC Championship Game.

title: ESPN’s ‘NFL Live’ instantly regrets all picking Texans to beat Patriots in divisional round
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots "New England fans are going to be mad at us.

" By Conor Roche January 17, 2026 | 11:10 AM 2 minutes to read The Patriots are three-point favorites to take down the Texans in Sunday’s divisional round matchup, but everyone on ESPN’s “NFL Live” is going with the underdog — even though they don’t like their picks.
When it was revealed that all five members of “NFL Live” picked the Texans to beat the Patriots in Friday’s episode, each of them expressed some sort of disbelief or regret.

title: A sad update on Dolly the dog: MSPCA announces euthanization after medical setback
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News A 2-year-old pit bull terrier mix had to be euthanized after she was found emaciated in Lexington last week.
MSPCA-Angell A dog that was discovered nearly starved to death in Lexington last week had to be euthanized due to complications arising from her severe emaciation, the MSPCA-Angell announced.
Dolly, a 2-year-old pit bull terrier mix, had been receiving intensive care at the Angell Animal Medical Center in Boston since last Saturday.

title: Mass. man sentenced to 10 years in state prison for DUI wrong-way crash
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Crime Cary Guy of Dighton pleaded no contest to charges of driving the wrong way on I-195 in East Providence while drunk, seriously injuring four people.

A Massachusetts man has been sentenced to a decade in state prison for driving drunk and causing a wrong-way crash on Interstate 195 in East Providence that seriously injured four people, Rhode Island Attorney General Peter F.
Neronha announced.

title: Dump truck plunges off Boston overpass after colliding with car
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Both drivers were hospitalized with non-life-threatening injuries and are expected to survive.
A dump truck crashed through a guardrail and plunged off a Boston overpass Friday morning after colliding with a car, officials said.
The crash happened around 7:45 a.

author: Kaley Brown

0 retired.

title: Hawks’ Kristaps Porzingis (left Achilles tendinitis) ruled out vs. Celtics
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Boston Celtics Porzingis played two seasons and won a championship in Boston.
Kristaps Porzingis has yet to play against the Celtics since being traded to the Atlanta Hawks last summer.
AP Photo/Colin Hubbard Kristaps Porzingis will have to wait to compete against his former team.
